attributes.action: To use his powers on the international stage to intervene in somalia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since the ethiopian troops came to somalia to apparently help the transitional government many innocent civilians have been killed, harrased and intimidated by both sides of the conflict. We as the somalis both diaspora and in somalia do not trust Ethiopia and have suspicions about their true motives. We would like Prime Minister of United Kingdom to use his powers within NATO and the UN to stablise somalia and bring peace. For the sake of humanity please help stablise somalia
